content: **knitted top in drops safran the piece if worked bottom up in stocking stitch sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no e-338 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials** drops safran from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 150-200-200-200-250-250 g colour 18 off white needles drops needle size 3 mm drops needles size 2 5 mm drops cable needle **knitting gauge** 24 stitches in width and 32 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size -------------------------------------------------------
